title: Alina's Fluffy Pancakes
directions: Preheat lightly oiled griddle to medium setting. To small bowl add flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir, combining ingredients well. In small, separate bowl, whisk together egg, milk and butter; add to dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened.

Immediately scoop batter by 1/4 cupfuls (60 mL) onto griddle, adjusting heat to medium. Turn when bubbles form on top of pancakes. Adjust heat to medium-low. Cook until second side is lightly browned. Serve hot, with butter or margarine and maple syrup. Makes 6 or 7 pancakes.
ingredients: 1/4 c. (60 mL) butter, melted and cooled
